name: Roots Against Humanity
description: Embark on a magical journey as an apprentice for the great witch Atropia. She has devoted her life to nature and has tasked you with restoring balance to the world. As you delve deeper into your duties, you'll discover the art of growing and crossbreeding different plants, each possessing unique traits that will aid you in your quest. However, as you progress, you'll begin to question the true intentions of your teacher. Will you be able to uncover the secrets of Atropia and achieve balance in the world?
